sentences.english: All his life, Dr Huang served the people.
sentences.chinese: 黄医生为人民服务了一辈子。

sentences.english: Each Olympic Games, is the Greek festival of people .
sentences.chinese: 每一届奥林匹克运动会，都是全希腊人民的节日。

sentences.english: The people's war has helped crush the feudal structure in the rural areas.
sentences.chinese: 人民战争摧毁了农村地区的封建制度。

sentences.english: Staggering tasks confronted the people of the United States , North and South , when the Civil War ended.
sentences.chinese: 内战结束后，美国南北方的人民都面临着艰巨的任务。

sentences.english: Moses manages to placate God momentarily, and then he turns around to face the people.
sentences.chinese: 摩西想马上安抚上帝，他把脸转向人民。

sentences.english: The Chinese people faced this disaster with compassion and courage.
sentences.chinese: 中国人民用爱心和勇气来面对这场灾难。

sentences.english: Chinese government is popular with the people because the government brings stability and wealth to the people.
sentences.chinese: 中国政府却因为为人民带来了稳定和财富而深得民心。

sentences.english: And the quality yet inexpensive consumer goods from China have been warmly received by the local people here.
sentences.chinese: 中国物美价廉的日用消费品，也深受当地人民的欢迎。

sentences.english: During this period of 6 years, he quelled the nationalities' Risingup in Yunnan successfully.
sentences.chinese: 其间，他成功地镇压了滇东北各族人民起义。

sentences.english: The dealer sells each cat for about 50 yuan (US$7.31) to restaurants.
sentences.chinese: 这些猫贩子以每只猫50元人民币的价格卖给餐馆。

sentences.english: We must orient our work to the needs of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须使我们的工作面向人民的需要。
第二道特色菜15个才仅仅8元人民币。

sentences.english: The banks can handle foreign exchange purchase for official foreign visit groups.
sentences.chinese: 银行可按当日牌价为您办理人民币与外币的兑换。

sentences.english: Renmin South Road, Luohu District, Shenzhen, China.
sentences.chinese: 人民南路，罗湖区，深圳，中国。

sentences.english: “Foreign critics would look at today’s data and argue for stronger yuan gains,” said Ben Simpfendorfer, a Hong Kong-based economist at Royal Bank of Scotland Plc.
sentences.chinese: 外国评论家看到今天的数据，又会说让人民币升值。

sentences.english: The commerce affects our people’s life in so many ways.
sentences.chinese: 这一贸易往来在很多方面影响了两国人民的生活。
